p: All viruses were cultured in the allantoic cavity of 10-day-old developing chicken embryos (CEs), which were provided by the Sinyavino poultry farm (Kirovsk Area, Leningrad Region, Russia), at 33 °C for 48 h. For ELLA, the viruses were purified and concentrated on a stepwise 30%/60% sucrose gradient, then aliquoted, and stored at −70 °C.
